front.title: C-Bindings for IPsec Application Programming Interfaces

abstract.t: IPsec based security is usually transparent for applications and theyhave no standard APIs for gathering information on connectionsecurity properties. This document specifies an API that increasesthe visibility of IPsec to applications. The API allows applicationsto allow BTNS extensions, control the channel bindings, and controlalso other security properties related to IPsec. This documentpresents C-bindings to the abstract BTNS API.
